flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Le encanta comer hojas. Si le ataca un Starly, se
defender con sus pas.

Es isst am liebsten Bltter. Wird es von einem
Staralili angegriffen, verteidigt es sich mit Stacheln.

Using the spikes on its rear end,  
WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and
feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKMONs feet are tipped with
suction pads that allow it to cling to
glass without slipping.

WURMPLE is targeted by SWELLOW as
prey. This POKMON will try to resist by
pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator.
It will weaken the foe by leaking poison
from the spikes.

It sticks to tree branches and eats
leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth,
which becomes gooey when it touches
air, slows the movement of its foes.

It lives amidst tall grass and in forests.
When attacked, it resists by pointing its
venomous spikes at the foe.

It lives amidst tall grass and in forests.
When attacked, it resists by pointing its
venomous spikes at the foe.

It loves to eat leaves. If it is
attacked by a STARLY, it will defend
itself with its spiked rear.

It spits a white silk that turns
sticky when it contacts air. It is
used to immobilize foes.

Often targeted by bird Pokmon,
it desperately resists by releasing
poison from its tail spikes.

It lives among the tall grass and in
forests. It repels attacks by 
raising up the spikes on its rear.

It lives among the tall grass and in
forests. It repels attacks by 
raising up the spikes on its rear.

Cible favorite des Pokmon Oiseaux,
il tente de se protger avec ses
pines venimeuses.

Often targeted by bird Pokmon,
it desperately resists by releasing
poison from its tail spikes.

Cible favorite des Pokmon Oiseaux,
il tente de se protger avec ses
pines venimeuses.

Often targeted by bird Pokmon,
it desperately resists by releasing
poison from its tail spikes.

Often targeted by bird Pokmon,
it desperately resists by releasing
poison from its tail spikes.

Often targeted by bird Pokmon,
it desperately resists by releasing
poison from its tail spikes.

Il adore manger des feuilles. Si un tourmi lattaque,
il riposte avec les piquants de son postrieur.

Ama mangiare le foglie. Se Starly lo attacca, si
difende con gli aculei che ha sulla parte posteriore.

It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly,
it will defend itself with its spiked rear.

Il habite les forts et les hautes herbes. Attaqu,
il riposte avec les piquants de son postrieur.

Es haust in Wldern und auf Wiesen. Bei Angriffen
wehrt es sich mit den Giftstacheln auf seinem
Hinterteil.

Vive en bosques y zonas de hierba alta. Si le atacan,
se defiende con las pas venenosas de su cola.

Vive nelle foreste e tra lerba alta. Se  attaccato,
usa gli aculei velenosi che ha sulla parte posteriore.

It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels
attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.

laide de ses pointes arrire, Chenipotte dchire lcorce
des arbres et mange la sve qui coule dessus.
Les pattes de ce Pokmon sont dotes de coussinets 
ventouses pour adhrer aux parois en verre sans en glisser.

Waumpel kann mit den Stacheln an seinem Hinterteil die Rinde
von Bumen entfernen und ernhrt sich von dem austretenden
Saft. An den Fen dieses Pokmon befinden sich Saugnpfe,
mit denen es auch an Glas nicht abrutscht.

Wurmple usa las pas del lomo para raspar los troncos de los
rboles, quitarles la corteza y beber la savia que emanan. Este
Pokmon tiene unas ventosas rematndole los pies, con las
que se adhiere al cristal sin resbalarse.

Grazie agli aculei sulla parte posteriore del corpo, Wurmple
scorteccia i tronchi degli alberi e si nutre della loro linfa.
Le sue zampe sono dotate di ventose che gli consentono
di attaccarsi ai vetri senza scivolare.

Using the spikes on its rear end, Wurmple peels the bark off
trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This Pokmons
feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass
without slipping.

Chenipotte est la proie de Hldelle. Ce Pokmon essaie de
rsister en dirigeant les pointes de son dos vers le prdateur.
Il affaiblit son ennemi en lui injectant du poison.

Waumpel wird von Schwalboss als Beute angesehen.
Dieses Pokmon wehrt sich gegen angreifende Ruber,
indem es die Stacheln an seinem Hinterteil auf sie richtet.
Es schwcht seine Gegner mit dem Gift, das aus den
Stacheln austritt.

Wurmple es la presa preferida de Swellow. La forma que tiene
de intentar defenderse es apuntar con las pas del lomo al
amenazante enemigo y debilitarlo inyectndole veneno.

Wurmple  la preda favorita di Swellow. Questo Pokmon
cerca di resistere puntando gli aculei irti sulla schiena contro
il predatore che attacca. Poi indebolisce il nemico emettendo
veleno da questi aculei.

Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokmon
will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the
attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison
from the spikes.

Likes sap and is abundant in the wild. Why it evolves into
various different forms is unknown. One cannot tell from a
Wurmple's appearance which form it will take when it evolves.
